actions.name: Marine Apex

cost.trigger: The user attacks a Swimming creature, or is Swimming.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user attacks a Swimming creature, or is Swimming.

Effect: The user's attacks have their Power increased by 50%, and the user takes 20% less damage from Physical- and Special-Category attacks.
